channel.title: How do i change the saurce?
channel.description:
How do i change the saurce on my server because im no0b lol. and also how do i change the amount of xp given when trainning on dummy's ect.?
thanks.

item.title: How do i change the saurce?
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

Download a new source.

for changing exp, go into client.java and search for

case 823

and you should see this

if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You attack the dummy."); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP(([b]5000[/b]*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP(([b]5000[/b]*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP(([b]5000[/b]*playerLevel[18]), 18); actionTimer = 12; } break;

change the numbers in bold to what you want the exp to be

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the saurce?
